alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 6:35AM EST until further notice by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... New Hampshire... Presumpscot River At West Falmouth affecting Cumberland County. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs at multiple campgrounds in the region. Water approaches homes along Bachelder Road and properties along Riverside Drive in Allenstown. Buck Street in Epsom floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 AM EST Thursday was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Saturday morning and continue rising to 9.3 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
